values.help:
0, Open: FF, Close: 00; 1, Open: 00, Close: FF;
              Default setting: 0
values.label: Toggle the sensor binary report value when the Magnet switch is opened/closed.

values.help:
0, Open: FF, Close: 00; 1, Open: 00, Close: FF;
              Default setting: 0
values.label: Toggle the basic set value when Magnet switch is opened/closed.
If battery power is below the warning value, low battery checking function will be triggered and Low Battery Warning Report will be sent.

values.help:
This parameter is available when the low battery checking
                  function is activated or the device was waked up by other
                  actions (i.e. the z-wave button trigger, magnet switch
                  trigger and the Wake Up Interval Set timeout trigger).
                  The Recessed Door Sensor will check the battery power
                  when it was wake up as other ways. For example: the
                  z-wave button trigger, magnet switch trigger and the
                  Wake Up Interval Set timeout trigger.
              Default setting: 86640
values.label: The low battery check Interval time,0-4294967295 seconds.

values.help:
Bitsets:
                4 -> Sensor Binary
                8 -> Basic Set
              Default setting: 0x00000100 (Basic Set)
values.label: Flag values for which reports to send when the Magnet of Recessed Door Sensor is triggered.
Reset configuration settings to factory defaults
